author: andreypz
body:
This commit is to add reduced gsf tracks collection to miniAOD.
The tracks added are:
 * The main track of GsfElectron
 * All ambiguous tacks of GsfElectron (if there are any)

The intent  for this code to be used for miniAOD of 2017 data/MC and legacy re-miniAOD of 2016 data.
title: Adding reduced Gsf tracks to miniAOD
